body:
## What's Changed
* [Proposal] Changed `valid_in` to exclude `valid_from = to` and `valid_to = from` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/95
* [Proposal] Add `range` argument to `.valid_allin` by @Dooor in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/98
* Fix JOIN query does not have `valid_from / valid_to` when using `.or`. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/99
* Fix typo in README.md by @Naoya9922 in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/101
* :tada: Bump v2.0.0 :tada:  by @mkmn in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/102

## New Contributors
* @Dooor made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/98
* @Naoya9922 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/101

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/compare/1.1.0...2.0.0

## What's Changed
* Add bitemporal data structure visualizer by @wata727 in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/94
* Release/1 1 0 by @kinoppyd in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/97


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/compare/1.0.0...1.1.0

name: 2022-05-12 First stable release
body:
This is the first stable release of ActiveRecord::Bitemporal

# CHANGELOG

## What's Changed
* Trivial typofix by @ujihisa in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/1
* fixtypo s/BiTemplal/BiTemporal/ by @supermomonga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/2
* add auto-assign setting file. by @tknzk in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/4
* fix CircleCI badge. by @tknzk in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/5
* Modify README.md by @paveg in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/6
* Remove to `.merge`. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/3
* Remove block argument from `.valid_at` and `.ignore_valid_datetime`. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/7
* Support thread safe to `ActiveRecord :: Bitemporal.with_bitemporal_option` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/11
* Remove arel by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/8
* `.valid_at` with `ignore_valid_datetime: false` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/9
* Add changelog document. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/13
* Change reviewers. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/16
* Update `rails-6.0beta3` from CI. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/14
* Add `.bitemporalize` method by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/15
* Add scopes by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/12
* [Bugfix] ignore_valid_datetime is not applied by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/18
* [Bugfix] Create record with `valid_datetime` out of the range `valid_from` to `valid_to` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/17
* Fix destroy flow by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/19
* update changelog. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/20
* Supported by multi thread by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/21
* Update changelog. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/22
* Add support rails-6.0-rc1. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/23
* Does not respect table alias on join clause by @meganemura in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/24
* Fixed by `Does not respect table alias on join clause` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/25
* Update changelog. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/26
* Add support changing swapped_id, when called `# reload` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/27
* Add validation in update by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/28
* レビュワー追加 by @AtsushiM in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/29
* Add support rails 6.0.0 by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/31
* Adjusted `created_at` and `deleted_at` in `update` and `destroy` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/32
* Do not use string interpolation in `where` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/35
* `force_update` does not refer to `valid_datetime` in validation by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/34
* Add validation support with created_at and deleted_at by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/33
* Fix id equal bitemporal_id by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/37
* Make it continuously testable, even after 2020 by @machupicchubeta in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/41
* add CODE_OF_CONDUCT by @tknzk in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/40
* Run tests daily on CI by @machupicchubeta in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/42
* Clarify supporting Rails 6.0.x by @machupicchubeta in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/43
* Except `bitempral_id` id in `scope_for_create` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/44
* Update rake requirement from ~> 10.0 to ~> 13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/45
* Add support `#force_update` with `valid_from` by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/46
* Fix typo by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/47
* Fix redefined `#reload` method by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/49
* Fix auto_assign reviewers by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/50
* Add auto_assign reviewers by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/51
* Bump activesupport from 5.2.1 to 6.0.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/48
* Fix bitemporal find method by @wakasa51 in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/56
* Use correct precision. by @alpaca-tc in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/57
* retry - Testing with multiple ruby versions by @alpaca-tc in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/60
* Fix Ruby 2.7 keyword arguments warnings by @kamipo in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/61
* Make all generated queries boundable by @kamipo in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/62
* Avoid extra string allocation by `# frozen_string_literal: true` by @kamipo in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/63
* Change created_at and deleted_at to transaction_from and transaction_to by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/38
* Add error info when updated. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/64
* Use the latest version of Ruby 2.7 by @machupicchubeta in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/65
* Add CI for Rails 6.1 by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/66
* Call `where.lock` only when present `id`  by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/68
* Don't use `each_association`, use `.valid_at!`. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/67
* Rename `master` to `main` in Rails by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/69
* Add CI for ruby3.0 by @alpaca-tc in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/70
* Rails 7.0 will no longer support Ruby 2.5 and Ruby 2.6, so we'll remove test. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/72
* Cut out initialization of datetimes to `bitemporal_assign_initialize_value` by @wata727 in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/74
* Add `PersistenceOptionable#bitemporal_option_merge_with_association!` by @wata727 in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/73
* Cut out building instances for update to another method by @wata727 in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/75
* Bump activerecord from 6.0.3.1 to 6.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/76
* Fixed a bug that prevented rollback on destroy. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/77
* Improve exception when raised an error on destroy by @wata727 in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/79
* Drop ruby 2.5 and update ruby versions in CI by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/81
* Updated implementation of ActiveRecord::Persistence#reload. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/80
* update auto_assign by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/78
* Improve bitemporal scope by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/39
* Add transaction_at support methods. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/82
* Fix scope of through association for not BTDM by @kouheiszk in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/83
* Fix broken format in README by @sugamasao in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/84
* Add support Rails 7.0 in CI. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/85
* Update support Ruby versions in CI. by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/86
* Add supoprt Ruby 3.1 x Rails 7.0.1 by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/87
* fix README.md by @nakamaksk in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/88
* bugifx undefined method `bitemporal_include?' by @osyo-manga in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/90
* Drop Support Ruby 2.6 & Update CI workflow config by @mkmn in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/91
* Bump version up to 1.0.0 by @kinoppyd in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/92

## New Contributors
* @ujihisa made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/1
* @supermomonga made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/2
* @tknzk made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/4
* @paveg made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/6
* @osyo-manga made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/3
* @meganemura made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/24
* @AtsushiM made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/29
* @machupicchubeta made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/41
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/45
* @wakasa51 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/56
* @alpaca-tc made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/57
* @kamipo made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/61
* @wata727 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/74
* @kouheiszk made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/83
* @sugamasao made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/84
* @nakamaksk made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/88
* @mkmn made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/91
* @kinoppyd made their first contribution in https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/pull/92

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kufu/activerecord-bitemporal/commits/1.0.0
